articles.title: Quantum Mystery Solved – Scientists Shed Light on Perplexing High-Temperature Superconductors - SciTechDaily
articles.description: Flatiron Institute senior research scientist Shiwei Zhang and his team have utilized the Hubbard model to computationally re-create key features of the superconductivity in materials called cuprates that have puzzled scientists for decades. Superfast hovering…
articles.content: A recent study has advanced the understanding of high-temperature superconductivity in ‘cuprates’ using an enhanced Hubbard model, paving the way for potential technological breakthroughs and demonst… [+9310 chars]

articles.title: I lost my mum, dad and baby sister to HIV in infected blood scandal - BBC.com
articles.description: Families torn apart by the infected blood scandal break their silence to BBC Panorama.
